content: No Commercials...
It's to easy
Good graphics.

Really nice hearts app. I like the ability to play with different rules (with or without the jack of diamonds bonus, for example.) Also, the AI doesn't cheat, though it might be nice if there were some more difficult settings. Still, a very nice hearts app, and it's so nice not to have any ads.
Fun for all and no ads
My day is not complete if I don't play a game every morning before I start my day.

This set of three modes for hearts is so easy, even on the so-called difficult settings that it is apparent that the software writers only knew the rules, but are at primary school level for strategy. If you want a challenge for any of these 3 versions, choose a different app. I use this one strictly to relax and laugh about comic level of players (the app) that slough stoppers. It is like playing against inebriated kids in early adult development, or against compulsive clueless gamblers. ðŸ˜´
Still playing and still having fun ðŸ˜€
Played this version of Jrarts on Windows Phone for years. Sadly, no more Windows phone (for now). Now playing Hearts on Android. Prefer the Winsows phone version.
Great graphics great game
The only thing I don't like is auto rotate is on during the game even when I have it shut off on the phone
have been playing your game a long time, its the best
Total fun!
This is the best game of hearts I've found online only problem is, does not work well with chromebook. Get it only some of the time.
Good.
Have played Hearts for many years znd many apps, this game is THE most honest and genuine version ever.
Just wonderful.
Great App
As good as it always was and works well with a Samsung Galaxy S10
Taking 1 star for being overly needy.
Great game
Fun, fun!
Great game
Loved the game on the desktop, and mostly love it here. my only gripe is that it constantly flips and there's no way to stop it!
Great game! Entertaining and works great.

I purchased the game, so I wouldn't have to deal with all the annoying pop up advertisements. Unfortunately they take your credit card information & the website won't allow you to install the game. It states it will download later.
Good

On the one hand, this is the best Hearts app I've found. It's generally clean looking and operating. Does the trick of providing a good, ad-free experience. But as a paid app it has shortcomings. Only two difficulty settings, the hardest playing more like medium. Seasoned Hearts players will not be challenged. Also, there's no end game notice of victory or loss--just the normal score update with a "new game" instead of "continue game" button. In other words, it's really easy to skip past. YMMV.
A bit too slow compared to the Windows mobile version.
excellent game
This is a great Application!
Difficult to tell when the game is over, and no indication of who won.
great game
The new format is great.ðŸ˜€
worth the 1.99ðŸ˜Š
Fun but need more themes

I do really love this game. But after playing so much, I've noticed a big flaw in the computer players. When they are losing and playing their cards, and they can't take all the points, they do not seem to know how to play and NOT take any more points. They play a big heart then maybe a small one, then another big heart, even though they have a very small one. This takes away the challenge to beat them. I hope the people who program these will make note and fix this. I still love the game.
Great game.

Fun, but the "full difficulty" version will allow another player to discard the ACE of Hearts....when you are clearly "going for it" and only have the J-Q-K. People I play with, will hold that Ace....at a cost of only 4-points....and defeat your quest.
Good, except sluggish control causes misplayed cards.
Good fun, addictive. Moonshots too easy. Deals often lopsided. Very enjoyable game, Thanks Random Salad guys!
good
smooth game play
It is addicting. It is my go-to form of relaxation.
I like the play except when i accidentally tap the wrong card that i want to play, there is no undo.
Sometimes, lets put it this way It is relaxing & it is never the same thing & over. Trying to outwit the computer, I find very much exiting, Thank you
A great implementation of Hearts
Great game to pass time.
You cannot stop it from rotating back and forth from vertical to horizontal orientation.
Needs lock screen option. Hard to play with screen moving.
Good counting during play.
Good Hearts game. Happy with it. Just wish you could speed up the game play more than its current max. But still, worth it.
I used the free windows version for years. No brainier to pay 1.99 for Android version when I reluctantly converted OS.
My all time favorite

Pace of play is very slow. Buttons are small. Paying for this version was a 
mistake. Go find a free version that you'll be happy with.
Challenges me when I have a chance to play.
Really good execution. Works well. Good graphics but not obtrusive.
way too simplistic
Good ol' fashioned Hearts!

It is a very very very good game
Love this app. Actually paid for it on another device. Going to do the same on phone.
The animations and key response are far too slow. They were much faster on my old phone with older version of exact game. Game is good otherwise. I want to play faster!!
Very good hearts game. Very similar to the Microsoft hearts game
Love Hearts and this game is perfect!
This is fun but still challenging

Great game

Great game!
Favorite game!
Graphics are very choppy. I would prefer to have the option of not passing.
I wish it had an "undo" function. It would be helpful to try differ outcomes/scenarios. I'm using this game to hone my skills. Great fun.
Game controls are a bit difficult. Sometimes plays the card next to the one I tap. Otherwise a fine game.
Typical hearts game with AI that don't understand how to stop the other players from shooting the moon.
Love this game

Wish it was free
Best UI for this game

It does an ok job of fending off shooting the moon, but the other algorithms are painfully simple. User interface is badly lacking. Just because this game is available in Windows, it does not mean that it is better than the other apps. Don't throw your money away on this.
